trans-unit.source: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as configurações que se aplicam a uma única página impressa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> classe é usada para especificar as configurações que modificam a maneira como uma página será impressa.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você pode definir configurações padrão para todas as páginas a serem impressas por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and modify the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> argument included in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar as configurações de página por página, tratar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos e modificar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> argumento incluído no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs> ou <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.QueryPageSettingsEventArgs>, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> events, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tratamento de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> eventos, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> visão geral da classe.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event and checking the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> argument of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra a manipulação o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos e verificando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> argumento de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: To use this code, add a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> component named `PrintDocument1` to a Windows Form and associate its <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event with the `printDocument1_PrintPage` method in the example.
trans-unit.target: Para usar esse código, adicione um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> componente denominado `PrintDocument1` para um formulário do Windows e associar seu <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento com o `printDocument1_PrintPage` método no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> class using the default printer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> usando a impressora padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa todos os campos com seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not create an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, but instead use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to set settings for all pages.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não criar uma instância de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, mas em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para definir as configurações para todas as páginas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> that describes the printer to use.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> que descreve a impressora a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> class using a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> usando a impressora especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.%23ctor%2A> constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and setting the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.%23ctor%2A> construtor é semelhante ao inicializar uma nova instância da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> e configuração de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterSettings%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the page, taking into account the page orientation specified by the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da página, levando em consideração a orientação de página especificada pela propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Landscape" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a altura e a largura, em centésimos de polegadas, da página.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> property along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A> property to calculate the printing area for the page.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Margins%2A> propriedade para calcular a área de impressão da página.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: A copy of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a página deve ser impressa colorida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a página precisar ser impressa colorida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é determinado pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.SupportsColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine if the printer supports color printing.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.SupportsColor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para determinar se a impressora oferecer suporte a impressão de cor.

trans-unit.source: If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a impressora oferece suporte a cores, mas você não deseja imprimir em cores, defina o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Color%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: The default will be `true`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão será `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir imprime um documento com a primeira página na cor, se a impressora oferecer suporte a ele.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> events are handled.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` tiver sido criado e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.QueryPageSettings> eventos são processados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies the relevant information from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to the specified <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Copia as informações relevantes do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> para a estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A> method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A> método para copiar informações relevantes para um `DEVMODE` da estrutura de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é útil quando você deseja fazer chamadas Win32 não gerenciadas que exigem um `DEVMODE`.

trans-unit.source: To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.SetHdevmode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para copiar informações de um `DEVMODE` estrutura para o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>, chame <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.SetHdevmode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the left of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada X, em centésimos de polegada, da margem física à esquerda da página.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the left-hand hard margin.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X, em centésimos de polegada, da margem física do lado esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: The hard margin represents the physical margin set by the printer.
trans-unit.target: A margem de disco rígida representa a margem física definida pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para acessar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.

trans-unit.source: for full access to all printers.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso total a todas as impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração relacionada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coordenada y, em centésimos de polegada, da margem física no alto da página.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate, in hundredths of an inch, of the hard margin at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada y, em centenas de polegada, da margem rígida na parte superior da página.

trans-unit.source: The hard margin represents the physical margin set by the printer.
trans-unit.target: A margem de disco rígida representa a margem física definida pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: para acessar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de relacionados: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.

trans-unit.source: for full access to all printers.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso total a todas as impressoras.

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração relacionada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a página é impressa com orientação de paisagem ou de retrato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para imprimir a página com orientação paisagem; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the printer.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é determinado pela impressora.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.LandscapeAngle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.LandscapeAngle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para determinar o ângulo em graus, que a orientação de retrato for girada para produzir a orientação de paisagem.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets a document's default page orientation to landscape through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, and prints the document.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define a orientação da página do documento padrão para paisagem por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.DefaultPageSettings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade e imprime o documento.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo tem três pré-requisitos:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `filePath` foi definido para o caminho do arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Um método chamado `pd_PrintPage`, que trata o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, foi definido.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `printer` foi definido como o nome da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the margins for this page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as margens dessa página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins" /> que representa as margens, em centésimos de polegadas, da página.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.
trans-unit.target: O padrão são margens de 1 polegada em todos os lados.

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, you can use this property along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> property to calculate the printing area for the page.
trans-unit.target: Ao lidar com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, você pode usar essa propriedade juntamente com o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.Bounds%2A> propriedade para calcular a área de impressão da página.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins to 1 inch on each side.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define o padrão configurações de página de um documento para as margens para 1 polegada em cada lado.

trans-unit.source: The example has three prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: O exemplo tem três pré-requisitos:

trans-unit.source: A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `filePath` foi definido para o caminho do arquivo para imprimir.

trans-unit.source: A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Um método chamado `pd_PrintPage`, que trata o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> evento, foi definido.

trans-unit.source: A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name.
trans-unit.target: Uma variável chamada `printer` foi definido como o nome da impressora.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.IO> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.IO> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho do papel para a página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize" /> that represents the size of the paper.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize" /> que representa o tamanho do papel.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default paper size.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o tamanho de papel padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> represents the size of the paper through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize> representa o tamanho do papel por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A> property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: Definido o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSize%2A> propriedade para a página para um válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSizes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção.

trans-unit.source: For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como você pode especificar um tamanho de papel personalizado, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSize.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper size based upon the size selected in the `comboPaperSize` combo box, and then prints the document using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define três propriedades para a página do documento padrão, incluindo o tamanho do papel com base no tamanho selecionado no `comboPaperSize` caixa de combinação e imprime o documento usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se as caixas de combinação específico existem.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page's paper source; for example, the printer's upper tray.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte de papel da página; por exemplo, a bandeja superior da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> that specifies the source of the paper.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource" /> que especifica a fonte de papel.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default paper source.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a fonte de papel padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> represents the source of the paper through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> representa a origem do papel por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A> property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: Definido o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A> propriedade para a página para um válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper source based upon the source selected in the `comboPaperSource` combo box, and then prints the document using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define três propriedades para a página do documento padrão, incluindo a fonte de papel com base na fonte selecionada no `comboPaperSource` caixa de combinação e imprime o documento usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se as caixas de combinação específico existem.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the printable area of the page for the printer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites da área imprimível da página para a impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> representing the length and width, in hundredths of an inch, of the area the printer is capable of printing in.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> que representa o tamanho e a largura, em centésimos de polegada, da área na qual a impressora pode imprimir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrintableArea%2A> property returns the correct value, whether the page orientation is landscape or portrait.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrintableArea%2A> propriedade retorna o valor correto, se a orientação da página é paisagem ou retrato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to print outside the margins of the page, but within the printable area.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para imprimir fora das margens da página, mas dentro da área de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer resolution for the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a resolução da impressora para a página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" /> that specifies the printer resolution for the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" /> que especifica a resolução da impressora para a página.

trans-unit.source: The default is the printer's default resolution.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a resolução padrão da impressora.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> represents the printer resolution of through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which contains one of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> representa a resolução de impressora por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que contém uma da <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> valores.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A> property for the page to a valid <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>, available through the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: Definido o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A> propriedade para a página para um válida <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution>, disponível por meio de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the printer's resolution based upon the resolution selected in the `comboPrintResolution` combo box, and then prints the document using the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir define três propriedades para a página do documento padrão, incluindo a resolução da impressora com base na resolução selecionada no `comboPrintResolution` caixa de combinação e imprime o documento usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo requer que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se as caixas de combinação específico existem.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer settings associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as configurações de impressora associadas à página.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> that represents the printer settings associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings" /> que representa as configurações de impressora associadas à página.

trans-unit.source: You can use the printer settings to find default values for properties of the page that are not set.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar as configurações de impressora para localizar os valores padrão para as propriedades da página que não estão definidas.

trans-unit.source: The handle to a Win32 <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para uma estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> Win32.

trans-unit.source: Copies relevant information to the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> from the specified <see langword="DEVMODE" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Copia informações relevantes para o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> da estrutura <see langword="DEVMODE" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy relevant information in a `DEVMODE` structure to the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar informações relevantes em um `DEVMODE` estrutura para o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>.

trans-unit.source: To copy information from the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> to a `DEVMODE`, call <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para copiar as informações de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> para um `DEVMODE`, chame <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.CopyToHdevmode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The printer handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de impressora não é válido.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> property does not exist or there is no default printer installed.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName" /> não existe ou não há nenhuma impressora padrão instalada.

trans-unit.source: for printing and access to all printers on the network.
trans-unit.target: Para imprimir e acesso a todas as impressoras na rede.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintingPermissionLevel.AllPrinting" />

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> to string form.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> no formulário de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A string showing the various property settings for the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que mostra as várias configurações de propriedade para o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" />.
